Class Wheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • chuckeles.sstasker.model.parts.PartWithoutHealth
      • chuckeles.sstasker.model.parts.Wheel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Part

    public class Wheel
extends PartWithoutHealth
    The W.H.E.E.L. is used to operate the spaceship.

    • Field Summary

      How much energy the wheel requires to function.

      How many turns has it not been operated by a pilot.
